Package org.mbild.mbwatch

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
org.mbild.mbwatch.Configuration
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISerializable
public class Configuration extends Object implements ISerializable
Parameter settings defining the look and behavior of the clock.
Author:
Matthias Bild

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Configuration.Numbering
    Enumeration of constants for adjustment of the clock's tick labels.
